item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Ah thanks. Yeah I just figured out something was too big by deleting sections of them. Thanks again.

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

NPCHandler only allows 15 drops per NPC. To edit that look in NPCHandler for:

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45];

And change that 45 to something like 300 (for 100 drops per npc).

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops
